alert.note: Alert for Plaquemines; St. Bernard (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 2:11PM CDT until June 20 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern St. Bernard Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Plaquemines Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 300 PM CDT. * At 211 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Poydras, or 10 miles southeast of Belle Chasse, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Port Sulphur, Pointe A La Hache and Poydras. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
